metadataAttributes.Title: Functional Programming in Scala Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Program on a Higher Level. Write elegant functional code to analyze data that's big or small
metadataAttributes.Skills: Scala Programming, Parallel Computing, Apache Spark, Functional Programming, Recursion, Immutable Data Types, Higher-Order Function, Laziness, Type Class, Referential Transparency, Reactive Programming, Data Structure,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: Martin Odersky ,Prof. Viktor Kuncak ,Dr. Aleksandar Prokopec ,Prof. Heather Miller ,Julien Richard-Foy ,
